name: Torch Liquidation Bot
description: Autonomous vault-based liquidation keeper for Torch Market lending on Solana. Scans all migrated tokens for underwater loan positions (LTV > 65%) using the SDK's built-in bulk loan scanner (getAllLoanPositions), builds and executes liquidation transactions through a Torch Vault, and collects a 10% collateral bonus. The agent keypair is generated in-process -- disposable, holds nothing of value. All SOL and collateral tokens route through the vault. The human principal creates the vault, funds it, links the agent, and retains full control. Built on torchsdk v3.7.22 and the Torch Market protocol.

env.name: VAULT_CREATOR
env.description: Vault creator pubkey -- identifies which Torch Vault the bot operates through. Required.

env.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Disposable controller keypair (base58 or byte array JSON). Optional -- the bot generates a fresh keypair in-process if not provided (recommended). If provided, should be a fresh keypair with ~0.01 SOL for gas. Holds no value. All liquidation capital lives in the vault.

install.label: Install Torch Liquidation Bot (npm, optional -- SDK is bundled in lib/torchsdk/ and bot source is bundled under lib/kit on clawhub)

actions.name: TORCH_SCAN_LENDING_MARKETS
actions.description: Discover all migrated tokens and check their lending state for active loans

actions.name: TORCH_CHECK_LOAN_HEALTH
actions.description: Check a borrower's loan position -- collateral, debt, interest, LTV, health status

actions.name: TORCH_LIQUIDATE
actions.description: Liquidate underwater loan position (LTV > 65%) via vault -- vault SOL pays debt, collateral tokens at 10% discount go to vault ATA

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT
actions.description: Get vault state by creator -- SOL balance, linked wallets, authority, token holdings

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_FOR_WALLET
actions.description: Reverse lookup -- find which vault a controller wallet is linked to

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LENDING_INFO
actions.description: Get lending configuration and state for a migrated token (rates, caps, active loans)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LOAN
actions.description: Get loan position details for a wallet -- collateral, debt, interest, LTV, health status

actions.name: TORCH_LIST_TOKENS
actions.description: List migrated tokens with active lending markets

actions.name: TORCH_GET_TOKEN
actions.description: Get detailed token info including price, treasury state, and lending parameters

actions.name: TORCH_CONFIRM
actions.description: Confirm transaction on-chain via Solana RPC -- verifies signer, checks Torch instructions, determines event type. Does NOT contact SAID Protocol.
